answers.answer: I had it with my second towards the end like u, I hadto watch everything I ate put my feet up all the time from swelling. My bp stayed high so they induced me at 38 weeks had my son he was totally fine i had to stay in the hospital an extra day abd  .  Was on magnesium for a little while for  my bp but it went back to normal after a  month. Don't worry its very common. Hope this helped.
I was diagnosed with this when I was in labor but I had the swelling before that just watch eating a lot of salt and when ur legs swell prop them up above ur heart it will help

I had a friend experience this she was 22 weeks and was sent to the hospital and diagnosed with bad preeclampsia they told her she had to deliver the baby cause her liver was shutting down... Stay on top of that they may say u have to stay in the hospital until u have the baby..I wish u all the best

I just went through it. I had my son at 31 weeks by c section because they couldn't keep my blood pressure under control. I went to the doc at 30 weeks got sent to the hospital and had to see a high risk doc and was in the hospital for 3 weeks total.. i had my son on the 4th and I'm still dealing with high blood pressure. I'm on meds for it. And my son is still in the hospital but he is doing wonderful. He was 2lbs 14oz when he was born. And he is already over 3lbs.. but i hope it's good news for you. And i wish you the best of luck it can be scary but doctors now a days are wonderful and so is the technology..

I had preeclampsia diagnosed at 7months and was put on no salt and bed rest restrictions... carried her to term +9 days... its not always as scary if you can follow Dr orders and your body can handle it. I wish you the best

I had preclampsia at 29 weeks stayed in hospital got steroid shots and had to be induced at 30 weeks very scary daughter stayed almost 2 months in nicu cus of bleed in brain but she is very healthy now besides very bad asma she will be 7 april 1 ;)  but make sur u go in if that pain gets too bad my was awful I wanted to die and my doc at the time tried to tell me it was a bladder infection took 3 times going in for them to finally tell somthn was seriously wrong good luck girli

Thank you guys for sharing your experiences! I was at the hospital yesterday and now all test are normL besides my blood pressure that keeps rising. It is currently 120/90 and is usually 110/60. They decided that I will continue with weekly check ups at hospital instead of at midwife office and if I get any other symptoms I have to contact them immediatly. They did ekg of me and baby, ultrasound, blood and urine tests.
Had it at 37 wks dey induced me and had him 24 hrs later he was 5 pounds 6 ounces it was my first pregnancy....

question: I'm 32 weeks now was sent to the hospital yesterday with high blood pressure, pain in upper belly and protein in my urine. They are thinking it might be pre eclampsia and I have to go back tomorrow for more tests. Have anyone had pre eclampsia and wanna share their experience?
title: pre eclampsia
